short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick way to generate a fast valid CPF/CNPJ

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Brazilian CNPJ/CPF is a unique identifier for companys/person. It consists of 14/11 digits in the format XX.XXX.XXX/XXXX-XX / XXX.XXX.XXX-XX. This code checks if a given CNPJ/CPF number is valid according to the CNPJ/CPF algorithm.
